question: This state approved a scheme to provide a pension of Rs 1500 to transgenders in the state.
explanation: Andhra Pradesh State Cabinet approved a scheme to provide a pension of Rs 1500 to transgenders in the state. Transgenders above 18 years of age, residing in Andhra Pradesh can avail pension under this scheme. Currently, there are 26000 eligible transgenders in Andhra Pradesh. Andhra Pradesh state government has decided to provide ration cards, plots and scholarships, as well as to impart skill development training for financial stability transgenders in the state.
